title: Question:
author: iv4n
content: This poll is purely for fun, I would like to hear your opinion on the best gambling games out there, and I wonder which games are the most popular in our community. I am sure there are numerous less-known gambling games played around the world,  so if you choose "Other," please specify the game in the comments section below, and I will add it to the poll.Let's vote and see which games we find most exciting, entertaining, or rewarding.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I like sport matches, sometimes tennis, but football most times. The issue I get with sport betting is they are of low odds. The high odd ones are not encouraging to go for because the chance to win such odds is negligible.Sometimes I can go for roulette which has been the casino game that I like that do not require any special skills, just go for some numbers and either you win or lose after the result is out, it also has high odd.

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: I vote sports betting and slot.I gamble a lot in sports betting because it's the best for me, I can bet my favorite team or player and watching the match. But since sports betting is not always happen everyday, so whenever I want to gamble more, I will choose to gamble on slot. With many variety of each game, the sound effect, the way to win etc, it will make me not bored during gamble.

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: Quote from: iv4n on June 28, 2023, 11:58:41 AMLet's vote and see which games we find most exciting, entertaining, or rewarding. I voted for sportsbetting because it is a very popular thing in my environment. Everyone around me bets on sports, but I do not bet on it yet even though I have some knowledge about it. It is very possible that if I decide to start gambling, sportsbetting will be my first choice to start with. My other option was dice, because I find it very exciting and quite entertaining too. I play with friends, but have never gambled on it. If I start gambling, it will be one of my first two choices.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Sportbetting is already winning. I think because gamblers are aware that they don't win on casino games overtime. I use to play dice and Hilo in my early days in Bitcoin, can't remember I win big but kept playing still. But after casinos started having sports, I also shifted as I read threads about people betting on matches.When they said its hard to rig sports, users also realized it. But dice still is popular to this day.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: QuoteWhat games do most people play these days?  (Voting closes: July 19, 2023, 11:58:41 AM)You may only select up to 2 options.My choice to one:Sports Betting: for me it's one of the games that is easy to bet on, it just requires an understanding of the sport, After all, we only have the option (1x2) or (1:2) after the bet has been placed, sports betting has a bigger chance of winning than games like Roulette, Poker, Slots etc.My second choice:Others: I have reasons for that, if I get bored of one game I can jump to the next, of course I play games that are easy for me to understand and have a good chance of winning.Conclusion: the number one and final choice for me.

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: Football is one of my favorite sports, every time there is a soccer match, I always place a bet on the team that I consider the favorite in that match. Slots are very challenging for me, when I get bored with one game, I can move on to another game. There is no guarantee that you can continue to win this type of gambling, the challenge and excitement of slot games can give me great satisfaction.Sports Betting (Football) and Slots are my favorite.

comments.body: If we speak about crypto gambling, then I have selected sports betting, because from time to time I prefer to place bets on UFC, and rarely on football games. But we always make fiat bets between friends when we watch sport live. Also I have selected dice, as I used to play autobet to gain wager. comments.body: from my opinion the most popular types of games today and often played by gamblers are:*sports betting*slotsto have fun looking for luck, of course we think that slot games will be one of the interesting games that is often used in society and in my country, slot games are currently popular in almost several places, I know several people who play slots.on the one hand there is sports betting which is considered as a type of betting to make a profit. comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: I have voted for my favorites. While I used to be highly active in dice gambling in the past, it no longer holds the same appeal. Perhaps it is because my schedule has become more packed, leaving me with less free time.The popularity of sports betting is quite surprising. Although it is still early in the survey to draw definitive conclusions, an evident trend is already emerging.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: My choice is Slots. I play slots more often than other gambling games, although sometimes I play other gambling games. But in the past, I played Dice a lot, and even though I lost a lot, I kept returning to Dice. And right now, slots are the choice of gambling games that I play the most. Even though I'm not someone who gambles every day, slots are my favorite game. I rarely bet on sports betting because I realize I lack the ability to choose the right team. And if I want to bet on sports betting, I just choose a team I know and place bets for that team.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Slot and Blackjack are my favorite game. Blackjack when I’m in the mood to play strategy game while slot when I’m feeling meh on gambling due to it’s addictive yet very simple game mechanics.I think Slot-Blackjack is the most popular gambling games combo since most of the gambling influencers that I watch usually play these games. Slot first to hunt bonus then use Blackjack if they are already down a lot on slot and need to recover quickly their loss bankroll. Sportsbetting is my last choice but I only place bet on sports that I really like.
